title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 3.3 - Designation of records access officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 3.3 - Designation of records access officers

State Regulations

One or more records access officers shall be designated by
the superintendent or the superintendent's designee from among the attorneys in
the office of general counsel, administration, or any other unit of the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
3.3

Adopted

New

York State Register May 20, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 20, eff. 5/20/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
